scripts.build: astro build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const distPath = path.join(process.cwd(), 'dist'); ['axi404.github.io-main', 'axi404.github.io-source'].forEach(dir => { const fullPath = path.join(distPath, dir); if (fs.existsSync(fullPath)) { fs.rmSync(fullPath, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Removed:', fullPath); } });" && pagefind --site dist
